original: Landoff, Gustaf-Adolf Vallentin, med. dr, Borås, f. 23/12/05 i Gbg av hovjuv. Adolf L. o. Olga Hjertman. G. 35 m. Ann-Marie Karlsson. Barn: Stefan f. 36, Örjan 38 (d. 44), Eva 43. Brita 46. — Stud :ex. i Gbg 26, med. kand. i Lund 30, med. lic. 34, med. dr 42. Assist :läk. v. Sahlgrenska sjukh. 34, e. o. aman. v. vanföreanst. i Sthlm 35, und :läk. v. Styrsö kustsanat. s. å., dito v. vanföreanst. i Hälsingborg 36-37, aman. v. ortoped. klin. i Lund 38, tf. aman. o. und :läk. v. röntgendiagn. avd. där 39, tf. överläk. v. vanföreanst. i Hälsing-borg 40, e. läk. samt tf. und :-läk. v. kir. avd. å Sahlgrenska sjukh. 41-42, andre und:läk. v. Borås las. kir. avd. 42-43, förste dito sed. 44. Resa t. USA 35. Ordf. i Anglo-Swed. Soc. i Borås sed. 43, i Borås underläk :-fören. sed. 44. Medl. av Frim:orden. Utg. en del skr., huvudsak!, betr. ortopedi, skelettkirurgi samt röntgenologi.
translated:
Landoff, Gustaf-Adolf Vallentin, M.D., Borås, b. December 23, 1905 in Gothenburg, son of court jeweler Adolf L. and Olga Hjertman. Married in 1935 to Ann-Marie Karlsson. Children: Stefan b. 1936, Örjan b. 1938 (d. 1944), Eva b. 1943, Brita b. 1946.

Education: Examined in Gothenburg in 1926, medical candidate in Lund in 1930, medical license in 1934, medical doctorate in 1942. Assistant physician at Sahlgrenska Hospital in 1934, acting assistant at the Stockholm Institute for the Deformed in 1935, attending physician at Styrsö Coastal Sanatorium in the same year, the same at the Institute for the Deformed in Helsingborg from 1936-1937, assistant at the Orthopedic Clinic in Lund in 1938, acting assistant and attending physician in the X-ray diagnostics department there in 1939, acting chief physician at the Institute for the Deformed in Helsingborg in 1940, junior physician and acting attending physician in the surgical department at Sahlgrenska Hospital from 1941-1942, second attending physician at the Borås County Hospital Surgical Department from 1942-1943, first attending physician since 1944. Traveled to the USA in 1935. Chairman of the Anglo-Swedish Society in Borås since 1943, of the Borås Junior Physician Association since 1944. Member of the Freemasons. Published several writings mainly regarding orthopedics, skeletal surgery, and radiology.

worksFor.name: Institute for the Deformed in Helsingborg
Institute for the Deformed in Helsingborg
